data.name: Rillaboom

abilities.name: Voltage Beat
abilities.text: Once during your turn, you may search your deck for up to 2 Grass Energy cards and attach them to 1 of your Pokémon. Then, shuffle your deck.

data.flavorText: By drumming, it taps into the power of its special tree stump. The roots of the stump follow its direction in battle.

data.name: Rillaboom

attacks.name: Drum Roll
attacks.text: This attack also does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Drum Beating
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't use Drum Beating.

data.flavorText: By drumming, it taps into the power of its special tree stump. The roots of the stump follow its direction in battle.

data.name: Rillaboom

abilities.name: Voltage Beat
abilities.text: Once during your turn, you may search your deck for up to 2 Grass Energy cards and attach them to 1 of your Pokémon. Then, shuffle your deck.

data.flavorText: By drumming, it taps into the power of its special tree stump. The roots of the stump follow its direction in battle.

data.name: Rillaboom V
rules: V rule: When your Pokémon V is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Forest Feast
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 2 Basic Grass Pokémon and put them onto your Bench. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Wood Hammer
attacks.text: This Pokémon also does 30 damage to itself.

data.name: Rillaboom V
rules: V rule: When your Pokémon V is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Forest Feast
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 2 Basic Grass Pokémon and put them onto your Bench. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Wood Hammer
attacks.text: This Pokémon also does 30 damage to itself.

data.name: Rillaboom VMAX
rules: VMAX rule: When your Pokémon VMAX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 3 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Max Beating
attacks.text: You may discard up to 3 Grass Energy from this Pokémon. If you do, this attack does 50 more damage for each card you discarded in this way.

data.name: Rillaboom

attacks.name: Wood Drain
attacks.text: Heal 30 damage from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Raging Repeated Strike
attacks.text: Discard any amount of Energy from your Pokémon. This attack does 30 more damage for each card you discarded in this way.

data.flavorText: The one with the best drumming techniques becomes the boss of the troop. It has a gentle disposition and values harmony among its group.

data.name: Rillaboom

attacks.name: Drum Beating
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, attacks used by the Defending Pokémon cost Colorless more, and its Retreat Cost is Colorless more.

attacks.name: Wood Hammer
attacks.text: This Pokémon also does 50 damage to itself.

data.flavorText: By drumming, it taps into the power of its special tree stump. The roots of the stump follow its direction in battle.
